summary: Utility module that supplies common helpers for the PyTorch Lightning test suite, including functions to obtain the test data directory, create a default TensorBoard logger, recursively fetch nested attributes, set up a model checkpoint callback, load a model from a checkpoint, and an unused accuracy assertion placeholder.
business_intent: Facilitate reliable and repeatable testing of PyTorch Lightning models by providing standardized utilities for data path resolution, logging, checkpoint management, and model restoration.
